channel.title: 637 loading 639 Black Screen on Login
channel.description:
Hello, I'm here to ask for some help from fellow coders here on Moparscape.
My friend Orel runs a server called MunityPK, and we're having some difficulties on Login.
When you enter your username and password, then click login, the client screen immediately goes black. I told him I would try and find some help, and if anyone could please be kind enough to help that would be great. We think it's the way the login is coded, but if it might be anything else, please let me know.
Thank you.
